resources.string: Integration for Sense apps into AOSP and other ROMs.
You don\'t have HTC Service Pack installed. \nMost HTC apps need HTC Service Pack to work correctly. \nDo you want to download it now?

The logs you can export with this app are helpful, but not the most helpful way to give information about problems to us developers. 
Android does not keep the full log, always just the last parts. This is a decision for environment, because you cannot always write the full log to storage, it destroys flash storage and battery life. 
So, if you want to post this log, beware to save it as immediately as possible after the problem you face occurred. Maybe reboot, wait a bit until your system is fully up, reproduce the problem and then save the log. 
If you want to help us the most, attach your device to a PC, reboot your device, and start Logcat into a file. Google will help you doing that if you don't know how.
Currently, all settings need a reboot to apply.
Removes the \"Unauthorized device\" message from the following HTC apps: \nHTC Sense Home, Facebook for HTC Sense, Google+ for HTC Sense, LinkedIn for HTC Sense, Twitter for HTC Sense, HTC Themes.
Allows to search and download HTC apps in Google Play Store, removes the \"not compatible\" message on the install page.
Show the system logcat of Sensify. Requires root permission to read system-wide.
Save the system logcat to storage to include it in a bug report. Requires root permission to read system-wide.
Tell HTC apps that your device has an external storage.
Tell HTC apps that your device supports USB storage (USB-OTG).
Material apps without specific colors will be tinted according to current HTC Theme.
Do not use the app theme, but the Sense Home theme of HTC Themes to tint Material apps.
Color to use for Android\'s notification panel header.\nSet the last color of the dialog to use your Theme\'s color.
Color to use for Android\'s quick settings. \nSet the last color of the dialog to use your Theme\'s color (automatically takes care of darkening it).
Use Sense Home\'s Theme also for SystemUI if you selected to use Theme color for SystemUI.
